testcase.name: TC001 Smoke Test
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "alphaWebSite"..............................................passed Then Verify that the Login page is accessible and loads correctly...........passed And Verify that a user can log in successfully with "userName" and "password".passed And Verify that the user is redirected to their profile page after logging in successfully.passed And Verify that the user can log out successfully...........................passed Then Close All..............................................................passed

testcase.name: TC002 Login Page
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "alphaWebSite"..............................................passed Then Enter "fakeUser" and "fakePassword"....................................passed And Verify that the user cannot log in with invalid credentials.............passed Then Close All..............................................................passed

testcase.name: TC003 Forgot Password
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "alphaWebSite"..............................................passed Then User uses Forgot Password button.......................................passed Then The user sends a password reset request by entering their "userName" as e-mail address..passed And Verifies that there is a renewed password in the last message by entering the mail account..passed Then User goes "alphaWebSite"...............................................passed And Login with username and new password....................................passed Then Makes a password update by entering old and new passwords..............passed Then Verifies that can login with "userName" and new password...............passed And Close All...............................................................passed

testcase.name: TC004 Change Password
testcase.system-out: Given User goes "alphaWebSite"..............................................passed And Entering with the most up -to -date password and user name..............passed Then Clicks to the change password button...................................passed When Renews the password by entering the latest password and the new password to be made..passed Then Verify that can be logged in with updated password.....................passed And Close All...............................................................passed
